EmailTemplate.subject: How to Make Changes to Your Shell Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Welcome to the Shell Fuel Card Program!
Now that you have an established account with us, you can easily make changes to your Shell Fuel Card account in three ways:
Via Phone: Customer Service is available 7 days a week, 24 hours a day at 1-866-627-7994 for assistance.
Via Fax: Use the attached forms to make changes to your account. Simply complete and fax the forms back to us at 1-800-395-0809.
Online: Make changes online anytime by visiting www.shellaccountmanager.ca. For guidance, please refer to the attached pdf for tutorials on our online tools!
Thank you for choosing the Shell Fuel Card Program.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
